description: Essential settings just doesn't show - I don't know the reason, when I installed the program it was showing. But now, without being able to see and modify export settings I can't even start using this app
I installed it and everything just works. I was able to sign in, setup download path, blender plugin, and download assets. No issues at all, even on Wayland and NixOS.
summary: Works great, no issues so far!
